    ## Inputs
    | Name          | Type     | Default | Description                                   |
|---------------|----------|---------|-----------------------------------------------|
| vpc_config    | object({ | -       | To get the CIDR and Name of VPC from the user |
| subnet_config | string   | -       | -                                             |
| ec2_config    | object({ | -       | Configuration for EC2 instances (optional)    |


    ## Outputs
    | Name                     | Description                                                |
|--------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------|
| vpc_id                   | ID of the created VPC                                      |
| vpc_cidr                 | CIDR block of the VPC                                      |
| public_subnets           | Map of public subnet details (ID, AZ, CIDR)                |
| private_subnets          | Map of private subnet details (ID, AZ, CIDR)               |
| ec2_instance_ids         | IDs of created EC2 instances                               |
| ec2_instance_private_ips | Private IP addresses of EC2 instances                      |
| ec2_instance_public_ips  | Public IP addresses of EC2 instances (if in public subnet) |
